title: raamaa raamaa gOvindha
sahitya:
rAma rAma gOvinda rakSincu mukunda

anupallavi

 kaliyuga manujulu nIku mahAtmyamu kaladu lEdanE kAla mAyegA

caraNam 1

 kAmuni dAsulu nA palukula vini kAvalasinaTula nADa nAye gada
   
caraNam 2

 pAmarulanu gani siggupaDucu mari mOmu marugu jEsi tiruga nAyenu
   
caraNam 3

 krovvugala narula goniyADina jiru navvulatO nanu jUDa nAyE gada
   
caraNam 4

 mati hInulu shrIpati dAsula kI gati rArAdani balka nAye gada
   
caraNam 5

 namminADanE pErukaina nI tammunitO naina balkavaitivi
   
caraNam 6

 kAryA kAryamu sama mAyenu nI shauryamendu dAcukoNTi vayayO
   
caraNam 7

 rAga rAga bratukitlAyenu shrI tyAgarAjnuta taruNamu gAdu
